servinfo.title: Additional Heater Assembly Removal and Installation

s1.ptxt: Drain engine coolant referring to Cooling System Draining .
Remove intercooler outlet pipe referring to Intercooler and Air Intake Pipe Components .
Disconnect additional heater wires (1) and heater hoses (2) from additional heater assembly (3).

attention3.ptxt: Make alignment marks on wires and additional heater body for a guide during reinstallation, if necessary.

s1.ptxt: Remove additional heater assembly (3) from its bracket.

servinfosub.title: Installation
servinfosub.ptxt: Reverse the removal procedure for installation noting the followings.

item.ptxt: Tighten additional heater wire nuts to specified torque.
Fill engine coolant referring to step 13) to 20) of Cooling System Refilling .
